thread.section_title: Lencred Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lencred | www.lencred.com
thread.title: Sandra Biehl

author: Sandra Biehl
title: Sandra Biehl
text: We have a small, emerging finance & accounting services business. things are taking off; growth is becoming rapid. We need working capital to initiate and handle the growth. Joel Wilson, our resource specialist, was as about as helpful as you could imagine--competent, full of great suggestions, and a delight to converse with. We are grateful for Lencred and their help.
